definition[0]: a small creature with a soft body, that moves very slowly and eats garden plants
example[0]: Perez still has a slug lodged in his left shoulder.
definition[2]: a small amount of a strong alcoholic drink
definition[3]: a piece of metal shaped like a coin, used to illegally get a drink, ticket etc from a machine
definition[4]: someone who gets to work by standing in a particular place until a driver stops and lets them go with them in their car
definition[5]: to hit someone hard with your closed hand
definition[7]: to drink an alcoholic drink, especially by swallowing large amounts at the same time
